doc:
Hope Hampton https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Hope_Hampton 0 Hope Hampton (Mae Elizabeth Hampton; February 19, 1897 – January 23, 1982) was an American silent motion picture actress and producer, who was noted for her seemingly effortless incarnation of siren and flapper types in silent-picture roles during the 1920s. She also at one time was an aspiring opera singer. Hope_Hampton ( Mae_Elizabeth_Hampton ; February_19_,_1897 – January_23_,_1982 ) was an_American_silent_motion_picture_actress_and_producer , who was_noted for her_seemingly_effortless_incarnation of siren_and_flapper_types in silent-picture_roles during the_1920s . She also at one_time was an_aspiring_opera_singer .
